summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1692, for the improvement of Westlake Boulevard, in the City of Seattle, from Denny Way to Mercer Street, by the construction of wooden sidewalks on both sides thereof, under Ordinacne No. 17917 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
